Name: Vatten Ramen

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: Really cute little place (though two floors) with nice canal views by the window. Tasty ramen with plenty of vegetarian and vegan options. Really recommend the salt and yuzu sake too. ü§§ü§§

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text:
Super nice spot for a nice ramen. Their vegan options are super tasty. Definitely a must if you are a vegan ramen lover in Amsterdam.
If it‚Äôs open, try eating on the lower part of the restaurant. The views are amazing and the music is always on point üëåüèª

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: It‚Äôs a hidden gem in Amsterdam. A bit small, with not many tables. Right next to the canal with a beautiful view. The staff were amazing to start with, very friendly and approachable, with good recommendations. The food was phenomenal! I even had to finish off the ramen with rice since the soup was so nice.

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: Delicious vegan ramen, several vegan options available. The staff was very friendly as well. I do recommend to book a table in advance as the restaurant is quite small. Super cute place though! In the picture you see the "special vegan ramen"

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: Nice people serving there, good, quick, service. Quality Ramen with takoyaki after. Both served fresh, ramen with pickles butter and three nori sheets. Small tea worth paying for, I had Jasmine tea. It is served with kettle and cup. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text:

The ramen was good, however if you want to add toppings (which come ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: Probably the best broth of the main Ramen places in the city center. At the time I was there service was super slow, but the servers were nice. It has a couple of seats right by the window facing the canal, make a reservation if you want to seat there.

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: Great view, super nice staff and the plates are nearly to perfection! Super recommend

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: Amazing ramen and Japanese cuisine made with top-quality ingredients. I was sincerely impressed.

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: Ramen with a view! I was craving for some ramen and have a goal to try all of the new ramen places in Amsterdam. I was missing the oomph in the chicken broth and the slices of chicken meat were tasteless. The karaage delivered though. (For pork lovers, no pork here options by the way. )

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: 20 minutes after ordering they tell us they don‚Äôt have rice and they can‚Äôt serve us the chicken teriyaki don we ordered.  No rice at a Japanese restaurant??  Took more than an hour to get our food, but it was really delicious!  The gyoza and the ‚Äútokyo‚Äù noodle was great.

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: We took ramen during the rainy day in Amsterdam. For starters, we had chicken karaage and takoyaki which both turned out to be so delicious esp the takoyaki (for me). The ramen broth was so tasty, noodle is soft and tasty too. Chicken ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen

Name: Vatten Ramen

Review Text: I really liked it, especially the noodles. But I think it's not the best ramen in Amsterdam. The meat was not that tasty.

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: Food is delicious and staffs are just the best! My wife was feeling sick they were just amazing with us. Really kind! And the view is also beautiful!!

Review Text: Amazing Ramen, with a broth made from scratch. Misses the loud and hectic japanese style and music you get at "Ramen Kingdom". But instead you get a nice view, nice service, a selection of tasty starters and an authentic delicious Ramen.

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) We were served friendly and quickly. We thought the ramen chicken and vegan tasted very good and is a filling meal. The sencha tea has a delicious soft taste. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) We went because a friend of ours had already gone, we were attended by the owner who turned out to be Spanish and from the same city as us. He was a charm and helped us with a lot of doubts we had. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) It's not the cheapest restaurant, but you have a very nice view of a canal, very good service and delicious food, the gyoza were delicious and pretty much the best we have ever eaten. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) The tables facing the canal on the other side are impressive. Brutal views over the canal. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Very good meal, but above all the setting is beautiful if you have the seats in front of the window. Very friendly service. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Fantastic homemade Ramen at the foot of the canal. Excellent attention and atmosphere, highly recommended! ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) A modern place, we ate overlooking the canal. Excellent food, delicious ramen. The price like everything in Amsterdam, but it is worth it. I do not give it five stars because the food takes a long time and there it is ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) If you like good noodles, check this one out. Sweet staff but mediocre broth with little flavor and also toppings medium. Dry chicken eg as a topping. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Enough vegan options on the menu. Service was friendly and food came quickly ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) It is ramen house with wonderful window scenery! Ramen is also a delicious and small shop, but there is a nice window view sheet that will make ramen several times more delicious. The window can sit 2 or 4 people ... ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) We've got new favorite food! (noodle) If you want to have Japanese noodle in Amsterdam cs try at here :-) and with good view! you can see we ordered extra noodle üòÇüëç ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Super nice location, with windows directly on a canal, one should be allowed to watch the pulsating life on the water and on the canal during the wonderful meal. Very tasty food and for every taste and budget. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Small place with an intimate and quaint atmosphere overlooking the canal. Friendly and helpful staff in helping to choose one of their excellent ramen! ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text:
(Translated by Google) This will be my absolute favorite restaurant in Amsterdam !!! Super friendly staff, a fantastic atmosphere and above all very good food.

Name: Vatten Ramen

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Very good Japanese cuisine, welcoming and smiling team, I recommend! ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Superb restaurant! Not expensive, the view is great, the musical atmosphere too and the broth is out of the ordinary it's really good! I advise ! ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Brilliant place. Very good ramen and attention to Japanese details. Toilet with butt washing system. Classic. ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Incredibly friendly owner and service. The food is also really tasty and definitely worth the price! ‚Ä¶

Name: Vatten Ramen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) In Amsterdam, it was difficult for us to find delicious food, even if it was expensive :) But this place, despite its modest appearance, is truly worthy. Recommend ‚Ä¶
